text: “Let’s count the blue bottles!”

Ten blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were nine blue bottles left on the wall

Nine blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were eight blue bottles standing on the wall

Eight blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were seven blue bottles standing on the wall

Seven blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were six blue bottles standing on the wall

Six blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were five blue bottles standing on the wall

Five blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were four blue bottles standing on the wall

Four blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were three blue bottles standing on the wall

Three blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were two blue bottles standing on the wall

Two blue bottles standing on the wall
Lined in a row all shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There was one blue bottles standing on the wall

One blue bottle standing on the wall
Lined all alone yet shiny and tall

One blue bottle did accidentally fall
There were no more bottles standing on the wall
